ygData.subject: of soliders and orcs
ygData.msgSnippet: Orcs, IMHO, suck as characters.  It s because of the attacks. Soldiers are just magic guzzlers.  A thief with the exact same mount of energy could do more

Orcs, IMHO, suck as characters.  It's because of the attacks.

Soldiers are just magic guzzlers.  A thief with the exact same mount 
of energy could do more damage than a soldier.  Boomerang attacks 
aren't that good against tents. 

At exp level 200+, a knife does as much damage as some of other 
attacks.  Of course, that's true for most characters: basic attacks 
become as lethal as advanced attacks at high experience levels, but 
the advanced attacks don't become super-lethal.
